title: CALLING HIGH ELO TOP LANERS
body:
Dear High Elo Top Laners,
 
Im putting together a team to possibly compete in tournys, OOL, play together in flex, and am in the need for a good top laner, prefeably Diamond5+

Must have a mic and a good attitude towards learning and working as a team to become a better player.

Message me In game - Lincasaurus Rex

tell me why you will be a good suit for the team.

replies.body:
Ign pandajuice.

Im ex challenger from garena. I have moved over to oce and im dia 3 atm.
